screen_desc: The screenshot shows a map with several Indian restaurants listed in the Mountain View area. The businesses are shown with ratings, distances, and short user reviews. The user can view information like operating hours, including those that are closing soon or already closed. Below, there are additional options to discover nearby places based on photos, showcasing a variety of Indian restaurants.
